ModMetaData.name: Really Custom Portraits
ModMetaData.author: Foxy
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a portrait to the selected pawns. This mod does not generate images, only displays them.
Portraits can be set in "Health" tab of a pawn. Images are loaded from "CustomPortraits" folder in RimWorld root directory. Something like: .../steamapps/common/RimWorld/CustomPortraits .jpg, .jpeg, .png images are supported.
